LanguageData.VQEA_ArchiteInjection_MainDesc: {PAWN} will be injected with volatile archites, causing {PAWN_objective} to develop a random archite gene. The process is dangerous and can cause development of random unwanted genes, rejection or even a drastic mutation. Obtain more ancient archite lab equipment to improve the process.
LanguageData.VQEA_PatientGownBonus: Success chance increased due to patient gown.
LanguageData.VQEA_ExpectedMetabolismSideEffect: Expected metabolism efficiency of the side effect gene
LanguageData.VQEA_CompleteMoreAncientLabQuests: You can complete more ancient lab quests to find and loot more lab equipment. Each piece of the lab provides unique benefits that will improve the odds of a succesful injection.
LanguageData.VQEA_RequiresArchiteCapsule: The process requires 1 Archite capsule available.
LanguageData.VQEA_StartInjectionDesc: Initialize the archogen injector, allowing a person to be inserted.
LanguageData.VQEA_InsertPersonDesc: Insert a person into the archogen injector. Their genetic material will be injected with chaotic archites, which will cause random genetic mutations with a chance to form an archite gene, but also random other xenogenes.\n\nArchite injection is a painful process and will force the subject into a temporary coma while the organism adapts to the new genetic composition.
LanguageData.VQEA_LetterDesc_Success:
The archite injection has been successful.

{PAWN_nameDef} has been injected with volatile archites and has gained a new archite gene: {ARCHITEGENE_label}.

As a side effect, {PAWN_nameDef} has also developed an additional gene: {SIDEEFFECTGENE_label}.

{PAWN_pronoun} will now enter an injection coma while {PAWN_possessive} body adapts to the new genetic composition.
LanguageData.VQEA_LetterDesc_SuccessNoSideEffect:
The archite injection has been successful.

{PAWN_nameDef} has been injected with volatile archites and has gained a new archite gene: {ARCHITEGENE_label}.

{PAWN_pronoun} will now enter an injection coma while {PAWN_possessive} body adapts to the new genetic composition.
LanguageData.VQEA_LetterDesc_Rejection:
The archite injection has been rejected.

{PAWN_nameDef} has been injected with volatile archites, but {PAWN_possessive} body rejected the alterations to the genetic composition.

{PAWN_pronoun} will now enter an injection coma while {PAWN_possessive} body recovers.
LanguageData.VQEA_LetterDesc_Mutation:
The archite injection has caused a mutation!

{PAWN_nameDef} has been injected with volatile archites, but {PAWN_possessive} body reacted badly to the forced evolution, turning {PAWN_objective} into a mutant.

{PAWN_pronoun} have emerged from the archogen injector and will destroy all the lab equipment {PAWN_pronoun} can find in the blind, animalistic rage.

You can try and stop {PAWN_objective}, or let {PAWN_objective} leave.
LanguageData.VQEA_ExperimentJoinsLetterDescription:
The {PAWN_title} known as {PAWN_nameDef} has emerged from a rusty cryptosleep casket, wearing nothing but a thin patient gown. They immediately join your colony.

{PAWN_nameFull} is known as an ideal patient. Their body accepts every archite injection without risk of rejection, as though their cells were made to adapt to genetic change. This makes them uniquely suited for experiments with advanced archite technology - in fact, they have already undergone a few experiments before, as they carry several archite genes.

{PAWN_labelShort} also suffers from a rare illness called Hemocollapse Syndrome. Their blood slowly fails over time, leaving them weaker as the days pass. Care and treatment can slow the disease, but it cannot be cured, and in the end, it will take their life.
LanguageData.VQEA_ArchogenInjectorPawnInside: Pawn inside, waiting for injection confirmation
LanguageData.VQEA_ArchogenInjectorNotInit: The archogen injector process has not been started.
LanguageData.VQEA_MustSelectGenes: You must select a gene from each category.
LanguageData.VQEA_MustSelectArchiteGene: You must select an archite gene.
LanguageData.VQEA_MustSelectSideEffectGene: You must select a side-effect gene.
LanguageData.VQEA_PawnRecruitable: {0} is no longer unwaveringly loyal due to {1}'s {2} gene.
LanguageData.VQEA_OverrideDesc: Select a colonist to override the ancient pipeline junction, siphoning a large amount of chemfuel from it. The pipeline junction will need time before it can be hacked again.
LanguageData.VQEA_OverrideDesc_Generic: Select a colonist to override the security on this.
LanguageData.VQEA_OverrideDesc_Queue: Order this container to be opened by overriding its security.
LanguageData.VQEA_LockedAncientVaultDoor: This ancient vault door is locked.
LanguageData.VQEA_InterceptBroadcastDesc: Intercept the broadcast to find out the location of another lab where the broadcast is directed.
LanguageData.VQEA_LoadCargoDesc: Load cargo into a capsule that will be sent to some other vault far away.
LanguageData.VQEA_LaunchCapsuleDesc: Launch the capsule with cargo down the pneumatic system. You may receive some goods from another vault in return.
LanguageData.VQEA_PneumaticCapsuleReady: Pneumatic capsule is fully loaded and ready to be sent.
LanguageData.VQEA_PneumaticCapsuleArrived: Pneumatic capsule from another vault has arrived.
LanguageData.VQEA_MessageCantLoadMoreIntoPneumaticTub: Your {1} can't finish loading the pneumatic capsule because some items became unavailable ({2_labelShort}).
LanguageData.VQEA_WonderdocBioregenerationSuccess: {PAWN_nameDef} successfully completed their wonderdoc bioregeneration wondercycle.
LanguageData.VQEA_WonderdocInstarehabSuccess: {PAWN_nameDef} successfully completed their wonderdoc instarehab wondercycle.
LanguageData.VQEA_WonderdocTimeReversalSuccess: {PAWN_nameDef} successfully completed their wonderdoc time reversal wondercycle.
LanguageData.VQEA_WonderdocSkillReformattingSuccess: {PAWN_nameDef} successfully completed their wonderdoc skill reformatting wondercycle.
LanguageData.VQEA_WonderdocMalfunction: Ancient wonderdoc suffered a malfunction during the wondercycle on {PAWN_nameDef}.
